questions.title: What is the purpose of beeQuiz?
questions.statement: Do you think **beeQuiz** is a web application to create _quizzes_ or to make _honey_?
possibleAnswers: beeQuiz is a web application to create quizzes
beeQuiz is a web application to make honey

questions.title: What is the license of beeQuiz?
possibleAnswers: beeQuiz is a closed source project
beeQuiz is an open source project
beeQuiz is not even a project

correctAnswer.explanation: beeQuiz is an open source project that you can find on [GitHub](https://github.com/beescreens/beequiz).

questions.title: Is it possible to contribute to beeQuiz?
possibleAnswers: beeQuiz accepts contributions from anyone, but only from bees.

correctAnswer.explanation: beeQuiz accepts contributions! Feel free to check the project on [GitHub](https://github.com/beescreens/beequiz).
